name: Math AttacK (ExagonSoft)
description:
Math Attack

This is a tech demo for my educational game, it proposes a mental agility tool, designed to exercise arithmetic operations in children, while having fun.

I'm intending on making a full release with more levels, difficult, better maps and modes, so if you enjoyed what's then throw a follow  :)

To Play!

Download, Unzip, Run Math Attack.exe.

In game select New Game, or continue if you already start one.

Controls

Since is a top down static game, keyboard not needed.

use the muse to aim your target.

use left click to open the shut dialog.

Goal

Destroy all enemies in every wave to win the level

Upgrades

Use your earned experience points to improve your ship, in order to beat stronger enemies.
